data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهِ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: to swing, halt in a place, move, toss. Mankind, people, others, men.
data.sentence: The word النَّاسُ comes from the root ن و س and is associated with the meanings: to swing, halt in a place, move, toss. Mankind, people, others, men.
The word إِلَى comes from the root ا ل ي and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word وَاللَّهُ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: sign, apparent sign, mark, indication, message, evidence, proof, miracle, communication, verse of The Quran. It properly signifies any apparent thing inseparable from a thing not equally apparent so that when one perceives the former, he perceives the other which he cannot perceive by itself.
data.sentence: The word يَاأَيُّهَا comes from the root ا ي ي and is associated with the meanings: sign, apparent sign, mark, indication, message, evidence, proof, miracle, communication, verse of The Quran. It properly signifies any apparent thing inseparable from a thing not equally apparent so that when one perceives the former, he perceives the other which he cannot perceive by itself.
The word هُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: free from wants, having no wants, in a state of competence or sufficiency or rich or wealthy; dwelt, abode; sing, chanted; eulogized, satirized
data.sentence: The word الْغَنِيُّ comes from the root غ ن ي and is associated with the meanings: free from wants, having no wants, in a state of competence or sufficiency or rich or wealthy; dwelt, abode; sing, chanted; eulogized, satirized
The word أَنْتُمُ comes from the root ا ن ت م and is associated with the meanings: you (plural)
The word الْحَمِيدُ comes from the root ح م د and is associated with the meanings: To praise.

data.meanings: to be poor/destitute/needy, in want of, poverty. faqira / faqara - to overwhelm with back breaking calamity, feel a pain in the vertebrae.
data.sentence: The word الْفُقَرَاءُ comes from the root ف ق ر and is associated with the meanings: to be poor/destitute/needy, in want of, poverty. faqira / faqara - to overwhelm with back breaking calamity, feel a pain in the vertebrae.
